0.title: Face wash gel suitable for oily skin with pimples
0.description:
• Deep cleaning of the skin from pollution, bacteria, fat, impurities and cosmetics
  • Exfoliating dead skin cells, regulating sebum secretion, controlling and helping to reduce acne
  • Hydrating, supplying cell membrane lipids with Lipolift technology
  • Contains vitamin 5B, hyaluronic acid, antioxidants and fruit extracts suitable for the skin

1.title: Face wash gel suitable for normal to dry skin
1.description:
• Gentle and daily skin cleanser, softening and reducing skin sensitivity and redness.
  • Strengthening, protecting and soothing the skin as well as preventing inflammation and dryness
  • Contains vitamins 5B, E, hyaluronic acid and plant extracts suitable for the skin
